ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: "Feeling Blue"- Part 1: As Baroness and Snake-Eyes leave a wounded Storm Shadow behind in the hospital for recovery to aid the Commander at Broca Beach, he learns he's been infiltrated by Blue ninjas, under guise as loyal Crimson Guardsmen, forcing him to take extreme measures as BN-001, their leader, attacks him. Meanwhile, Storm Shadow escapes from the hospital before he can be questioned by police from last issue's actions. Loyal Cobra troopers run to the Commander's aid as their helicopters run dangerously low on fuel, forcing them to land and take control of a freighter to get there.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:21. [CVDB331971] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:25. [Issue ID 940724]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Herb Trimpe,Larry Hama,Romulo Fajardo Jr.,Ron Frenz,Sal Buscema
ComicInfo.Characters: Crimson Guardsmen (real ones),blue ninjas (disguised as Crimson Guardsmen),Dr. Mindbender,Viper troopers],Storm Shadow,blue ninjas (undisguised)],Tele-Vipers,Cobra [Cobra Commander,Cobra troopers,Blue Ninjas [BN-001 (leader),Techno-Viper,Stinger Jeep driver,G.I. Joe [Snake-Eyes],Baroness
ComicInfo.Title: "Feeling Blue"- Part 1
